title: Convert MS to BFT
description: This function converts a value from MS (Meteo Standard) to BFT (Beaufort scale) using a specific mathematical transformation. The transformation involves applying an exponential function to the input MS value, scaled by a constant factor, and then converting the result to an integer.
name: MS_TO_BFT

input.name: MS
input.description: The input value in Meteo Standard (MS) that needs to be converted to Beaufort scale.

output.name: BFT
output.description: The resulting integer value in the Beaufort scale corresponding to the input MS value.

return_value.description: The integer result of the conversion from MS to BFT.
